text: Medium Tyler Henry Addresses The ‘ Chilling ’ Messages Kristin Cavallari ’ s Deceased Brother Expressed During Reading We hope Kristin Cavallari got some closure while meeting with Tyler Henry. Ahead of Hollywood Medium ‘ s February 28 return, the clairvoyant spoke with E! News and teased some chilling moments from his sit down with The Hills alum. Go on … Related : Kristin Set To Have Her Own Reality Show With Jay! As you may recall, the former MTV star lost her brother Michael after he was found deceased in Utah. To make matters worse, the late Mr. Cavallari ’ s passing was confirmed after an extensive manhunt was led by the authorities.
